name: lean
description: An extension for VS Code which provides support for the Lean language.

lean.executablePath.markdownDescription: Path to the Lean executable to use. **DO NOT CHANGE** from the default `lean` unless you know what you're doing!

lean.leanpkgPath.markdownDescription: Path to the leanpkg executable to use. **DO NOT CHANGE** from the default `leanpkg` unless you know what you're doing!

lean.memoryLimit.markdownDescription: Set a memory limit (in megabytes) for the Lean server.

lean.timeLimit.markdownDescription: Set a deterministic timeout (it is approximately the maximum number of memory allocations in thousands) for the Lean server.

lean.extraOptions.markdownDescription: Extra command-line options for the Lean server.

lean.progressMessages.markdownDescription: Show error messages where Lean is still checking.

lean.roiModeDefault.markdownDescription: Set the default region of interest mode (nothing, visible, lines, linesAndAbove, open, or project) for the Lean extension.

lean.input.customTranslations.markdownDescription: Add additional input Unicode translations. Example: `{"foo": "☺"}` will correct `\foo` to `☺`.

lean.input.languages.markdownDescription: Enable Lean Unicode input in other file types.

items.description: the name of a language, e.g. 'lean', 'markdown'

lean.input.leader.markdownDescription: Leader key to trigger input mode.

lean.input.eagerReplacementEnabled.markdownDescription: Enable eager replacement of abbreviations that uniquely identify a symbol.

lean.infoViewAllErrorsOnLine.markdownDescription: Info view: show all errors on the current line, instead of just the ones on the right of the cursor.

lean.infoViewAutoOpen.markdownDescription: Info view: open info view when Lean extension is activated.

lean.infoViewAutoOpenShowGoal.markdownDescription: Info view: auto open shows goal and messages for the current line (instead of all messages for the whole file)

lean.infoViewStyle.markdownDescription: Add an additional CSS snippet to the info view.

lean.infoViewTacticStateFilters.markdownDescription:
An array of objects containing regular expression strings that can be used to filter (positively or negatively) the tactic state in the info view. Set to an empty array `[]` to hide the filter select dropdown.
 
 Each object must contain the following keys: 'regex': string, 'match': boolean, 'flags': string.
 'regex' is a properly-escaped regex string,
 'match' = true (false) means blocks in the tactic state matching 'regex' will be included (excluded) in the info view, 
 'flags' are additional flags passed to the JavaScript `RegExp` constructor.
 The 'name' key is optional and may contain a string that is displayed in the dropdown instead of the full regex details.

items.description: an object with required properties 'regex': string, 'match': boolean, and 'flags': string, and optional property 'name': string

regex.description: a properly-escaped regex string, e.g. '^_' matches any string beginning with an underscore

match.description: whether tactic state lines matching the value of 'regex' should be included (true) or excluded (false)

flags.description: additional flags passed to the RegExp constructor, e.g. 'i' for ignore case

lean.infoViewFilterIndex.markdownDescription: Index of the filter applied to the tactic state (in the array infoViewTacticStateFilters). An index of -1 means no filter is applied.

lean.typeInStatusBar.markdownDescription: Show the type of term under the cursor in the status bar.

lean.typesInCompletionList.markdownDescription: Display types of all items in the list of completions. By default, only the type of the highlighted item is shown.

commands.title: Paste Tactic Suggestion
commands.description: Pastes a suggestion provided by a tactic (e.g. from squeeze_simp)

commands.title: Info View: Display Goal
commands.description: Display the goal and any messages at the current position in the info view.

commands.title: Info View: Toggle "All Messages"
commands.description: Toggles the "All Messages" widget in the info view.

commands.title: Info View: Copy Contents to Comment
commands.description: Copy the contents of the currently active tactic state widget to a new comment on the previous line.

commands.title: Info View: Toggle Pin
commands.description: Create or remove a tactic state widget pinned to show the goal at the current position.

commands.title: Info View: Toggle Updating
commands.description: Pause / Continue live updating of the main tactic state widget.

commands.title: Select Region-of-interest
commands.description: Select files to be checked by the Lean server.

commands.title: Check Nothing
commands.description: Disable automatic checking of Lean code.

commands.title: Check Visible Files
commands.description: Automatically check all files that are visible.

commands.title: Check visible lines and above
commands.description: Automatically check all visible lines and lines above them.

commands.title: Check Project Files
commands.description: Automatically check all files in the workspace.

commands.title: Batch Execute File
commands.description: Execute the current file using Lean.
